meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alison Haertjens Jeremy Harmon Amy Carruthers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4387.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Alison Haertjens, a human resources system specialist originally from Readington, New Jersey
Jeremy Harmon, a travel accountant originally from Muncie, Indiana
Amy Carruthers, a homemaker from Culver, South Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,375)

tr.td: DATELINE: 1903
GOLF COURSES
FASHION HISTORY
OSCAR WILDE & CRAZY GUY
THE SHAPE OF THINGS
MIXED FRUIT
